name: sim-city
description:
Strong guards separate you from the other parts of your poor city.
Build your part well and you might be able to break through to the other players.
There's also a neutral part in the middle of the city with twice more towns and all Forts built.
Recommended difficulty: 160%.
Up to 8 players.
Size XL.
Inspired by the Pyda XL template.
author: Warzyw647

1.01: limited version for in branch 1.3 to vcmi 1.3.x and added branch 1.4 for vcmi versions 1.4+
1.02: added human player limit instead of ai player limit for compatibility with 1.4
